dcterms:creator: Xiongkuo Min
Guangtao Zhai
Ke Gu
Xiaokang Yang
dcterms:description: The AVAD dataset comprises 45 video clips with durations ranging from 5 to 10 seconds, covering various audio-visual activities, such as playing the piano, playing basketball, conducting interviews, etc. This dataset contains eye-tracking data from 16 participants.
dcterms:title: AVAD

dcterms:creator: Antoine Coutrot
Nathalie Guyader
dcterms:description: Coutrot1 consists of 60 video clips covering four visual categories: one moving object, several moving objects, landscapes, and faces. The corresponding eye-tracking data are obtained from 72 participants.
dcterms:title: Coutrot1

dcterms:creator: Antoine Coutrot
Nathalie Guyader
dcterms:description: Coutrot2 includes 15 video clips recording four individuals having a meeting, with eye-tracking data from 40 participants.
dcterms:title: Coutrot2

dcterms:creator: Parag K Mital
Tim J Smith
Robin L Hill
John M Henderson
dcterms:description: The DIEM dataset contains 84 video clips, including game trailers, music videos, advertisements, etc., captured from 42 participants. Notably, the audio and visual tracks in these videos do not naturally correspond.
dcterms:title: DIEM

dcterms:creator: Petros Koutras
Petros Maragos
dcterms:description: The ETMD dataset comprises 12 video clips extracted from various Hollywood movies, with eye-tracking data annotated by 10 different persons.
dcterms:title: ETMD

dcterms:creator: Michael Gygli
Helmut Grabner
Hayko Riemenschneider
Luc Van Gool
dcterms:description: The SumMe dataset consists of 25 video clips covering diverse topics, such as playing ball, cooking, travelling, etc.
dcterms:title: SumMe
